name: Smol Lander
description:
What began as the output of a tutorial on how to develop using PICO-8, continues as my platform (geddit?) to learn more about this tremendously neat and adorable fantasy console.

Your mission, as an autonomous landing AI, is to safely guide the new arrivals to the landing platform. Not too fast though!! You don't want to hit the ground too hard. Tower reports that there has been meteor activity in the area, so keep a weather-sensor to the horizon.

I hope you enjoy, Smol Lander!
